items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: PDFQuery is a lightweight semantic document retriever. It extracts text from PDFs, chunks it, creates vector embeddings using Sentence Transformers, stores them in FAISS, and allows semantic search to retrieve the most relevant document chunks based on user queries. Ideal for building search pipelines or integrating with downstream QA systems.
items.title: Brain-Bot-17/PDFQuery: PDFQuery is a lightweight semantic document retriever. It extracts text from PDFs, chunks it, creates vector embeddings using Sentence Transformers, stores them in FAISS, and allows semantic search to retrieve the most relevant document chunks based on user queries. Ideal for building search pipelines or integrating with downstream QA systems.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: AI Hiring Assistant is an intelligent recruitment tool. This project uses NLP and lightweight ML to match candidates to job descriptions, automate scheduling, and streamline communication for HR teams.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: nodedb-json is a lightweight JSON file database tool designed for Electron applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, reading, querying, updating, and deleting data stored in JSON files.
